content: this crochet pattern is for a christmas coaster although i made my coasters in traditional christmas colors they will look great in other colors as well yarn worsted weight #4 cotton yarn i used sugar n cream cotton yarn crochet hooks 4 5 mm finished size about 5-1/4 13 cm in diameter skill level intermediate language english free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/christmas-coaster-crochet-pattern/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format video tutorial https //youtu be/z_q1kcmjyj4 si=hnpifbkilen1iixg
